title: Alphabet, Nvidia, PepsiCo And Other Big Stocks Moving Higher On Monday
text: U.S. stocks were higher, with the Dow Jones index gaining around 100 points on Monday. Shares of  Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOGL) (NASDAQ GOOG) rose sharply during Monday’s session following reports suggesting Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL) is in discussions to integrate Google Gemini into iPhones. Apple and Google are in active negotiations over potentially building Google’s Gemini AI engine into the iPhone, according to Bloomberg. Alphabet shares climbed 6.3% to $150.09 on Monday. Here are some other big stocks recording gains in today’s session.
